iEM3000_Series.summary: A series of DIN rail-mounted energy meters for sub-billing and cost allocation. Differentiated by direct vs. CT connection and communication protocol.

model_breakdown.key_differentiator: Pulse Output only. Base models for energy measurement.
M-Bus Communication. For integration into M-Bus networks.
Modbus RTU Communication. For standard industrial BMS integration.
Modbus RTU + Digital I/O. Adds tariff control and alarm capabilities.
BACnet MS/TP Communication. For building automation systems.

communications.protocols: Modbus RTU, M-Bus, BACnet MS/TP, LonWorks (model dependent)

inputs_and_outputs.digital_io: Available on iEM3x55 models. Can be configured for Pulse Counting (WAGES), Tariff Control, or Alarm Status.
inputs_and_outputs.pulse_output: Available on all models for energy pulsing.

mechanical.width: 4 to 7 modules (18mm per module), model dependent

PM2000_Series.summary: 96x96 mm panel-mount meters for basic power and energy monitoring, with LED (PM2100) or LCD (PM2200) options. Models add features sequentially.

model_breakdown.key_differentiator: Base model. Measures V, I, P, Q, S, PF, Freq, Energy.
Adds Min/Max recording and THD measurement up to 15th order.
Adds embedded I/O (2 DI, 2 Relay Out).
Adds RS-485 Modbus port, THD up to 31st order, and data logging (PM2230).

electrical.measurement_voltage: Up to 480 V L-L CAT III, 277 V L-N CAT III

power_quality_features.harmonics: THD and individual harmonics up to the 15th (PM2x20) or 31st order (PM2x30).

communications.serial: RS-485 Modbus RTU port (on PM2130 and PM2230)
communications.security: Option to disable RS-485 port via front panel.

data_management.min_max_logging: Recording of Min/Max values with timestamp (PM2x20 and PM2x30).

inputs_and_outputs.embedded: 2 Digital Inputs and 2 Relay Outputs embedded in PM2125C and PM2225C models.
inputs_and_outputs.optional_modules: Modules available for 2 DI/2 DO, 2 AI/2 AO, or 2 DI/2 Relays.

PM5000_Series.summary: A broad range of panel-mount meters scaling from general purpose (PM5100/5300) to advanced network monitoring (PM5500) with higher accuracy and features.

model_breakdown.key_differentiator: Class 0.5S, RS-485 Modbus. Entry-level for networkable metering.
Class 0.5S, RS-485, Data Logging, 2 DI/2 DO. Adds logging and more I/O.
Class 0.5S, Ethernet Port, Data Logging, 2 DI/2 DO. Replaces serial with Ethernet.
Class 0.2S, Dual Ethernet, Data Logging, 4 DI/2 DO, Harmonics to 63rd. High accuracy base model.
Adds Sag/Swell detection and Waveform Capture to the PM5560 feature set.

performance_and_accuracy.class_or_accuracy: Class 0.2 (±0.2%) for PM55xx / Class 0.5 (±0.5%) for PM51xx/53xx
Class 0.2 (±0.15%) for PM55xx / Class 0.5 (±0.5%) for PM51xx/53xx
Class 0.2 (±0.2%) for PM55xx / Class 0.5 (±0.5%) for PM51xx/53xx

electrical.measurement_voltage: Up to 690 V L-L CAT III

power_quality_features.harmonics_pm5100_5300: THD and individual odd harmonics up to 15th (PM51xx) or 31st (PM53xx).
power_quality_features.harmonics_pm5500: THD, TDD, and individual harmonics up to the 63rd.

communications.ethernet_pm5500: Dual port (daisy-chaining), Modbus TCP, BACnet/IP, EtherNet/IP.

data_management.data_logging: Available on PM5300 and PM5500 series.
data_management.alarming: 33 standard alarms (PM51xx), 35+ logic alarms (PM53xx), extensive alarms with email-on-alarm (PM55xx).

inputs_and_outputs.pm5300: 2 Digital Inputs, 2 Digital Outputs. Relay option available.
inputs_and_outputs.pm5500: Multiple I/O configurations including 4 DI, 2 DO, optional Analog Inputs and RCM inputs.

PM8000_Series.summary: Compact, modular Class 0.2S meters for critical facilities, featuring advanced PQ analysis like disturbance direction detection and extensive communication options.

model_breakdown.key_differentiator: Essential Feature Set. Core high-accuracy metering.
Standard Feature Set. Adds data logging, alarms, basic PQ compliance, and waveform capture.
Advanced Feature Set. Adds advanced PQ compliance (EN50160) and disturbance direction detection.

electrical.measurement_voltage: Up to 690 V L-L CAT III

power_quality_features.reporting: Onboard PQ compliance reports for EN 50160 and IEEE 519 (PM83xx).
power_quality_features.disturbance_direction: Patented algorithm provides indicator for upstream/downstream location of disturbances (PM83xx).
power_quality_features.waveform_capture: High-resolution (up to 512 samples/cycle), triggered by alarm or manually (PM82xx and PM83xx).
power_quality_features.sag_swell: Disturbance detection and capture on any voltage or current channel.

communications.ethernet: Dual port, supporting daisy-chaining and multiple protocols.
communications.protocols: Modbus RTU, Modbus TCP, DNP3, IEC 61850.

data_management_and_security.web_server: Onboard web server for access to data, reports, and alarms.
data_management_and_security.time_sync: GPS time synchronization via RS-485 port.
data_management_and_security.security: Up to 50 configurable user accounts, port control, anti-tamper seals.

modularity.architecture: ION technology allows for flexible, field-installable I/O modules.

mechanical.form_factors: Panel Mount with integrated display, DIN Rail mount, Remote Display.

ION9000_Series.summary: Flagship, highest-performance meter for the most critical applications. Combines certified Class 0.1S energy accuracy with Class A power quality analysis.

model_breakdown.key_differentiator: Base model. Certified Class 0.1S energy and Class A Power Quality meter.
Adds High-Speed Transient Capture (10 MHz sampling) to detect microsecond-level voltage events.

electrical.measurement_voltage: Up to 690 V L-L CAT III

power_quality_features.high_speed_transient_capture: ION9000T model only. 10 MHz sampling rate captures events as short as 100 nanoseconds.
power_quality_features.disturbance_direction: Patented algorithm determines if a disturbance occurred upstream or downstream.
power_quality_features.reporting: Onboard pass/fail PQ assessment for EN50160 and IEEE519.
power_quality_features.harmonics: Individual harmonics and interharmonics up to the 63rd.

communications_and_cybersecurity.ethernet: Dual port, supporting daisy-chaining and multiple protocols.
communications_and_cybersecurity.protocols: Modbus, DNP3, IEC 61850, HTTPS, SFTP, SNMP, Syslog.
communications_and_cybersecurity.gateway_functionality: Ethernet-to-serial gateway for up to 31 serial devices.
communications_and_cybersecurity.security: Secure webpages (HTTPS), secure file transfer (SFTP), port control, extensive Syslog logging.

data_management.web_server: Onboard web server with customizable pages.

modularity.design: Field-swappable I/O modules for flexible configuration.
